creator: Matrimony.com Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
This is the official Android app for BharatMatrimony.com – the world’s most trusted matrimony portal. BharatMatrimony facilitates more marriages than any other matchmaking service in the world. We are featured in the Limca Book of World Records for the highest number of documented marriages online.

Our new and improved mobile app features superb performance, user-friendly navigation and awesome design. Take a look at some of its key features listed below:

• Register and create your profile right through the app.
• Search for suitable matches, refine results, and save favorites for future viewing.
• Stay online and chat on-the-go through the Matrimony Messenger – anytime, anywhere!
• Use the GPS-enabled City Search feature to find relevant matches near your location.
• Get instant notifications – never miss any communication from anyone, ever again!
• View members’ profiles, photos and phone numbers; send interests or personalized messages directly through mobile.
• Be 100% secure – count on us to keep all your information safe and private.
• Easily sync your BharatMatrimony.com account with the app for a mobile-ready partner search.
• Use conveniently – the app is really lightweight and takes less storage space.

Globally, we are the preferred NRI matrimony service provider for aspiring brides and grooms to find their perfect partner, especially for NRI communities spread over UK, USA, Canada, Australia, Singapore, UAE, Malaysia, Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Oman, and so on. In India, whether it’s a fun-filled “shaadi” for a North Indian family or a coveted “kalyanam” in a South Indian household, our regional domains have covered them all!

We have helped millions of destined couples unite together through our 14 regional matrimony portals like Tamil Matrimony, Telugu Matrimony and Kerala Matrimony to name a few.

App users can also browse matching profiles from all Indian communities such as Nair, Ezhava, Kayastha, Arya Vysya, SC, Christian - Roman Catholic, Reddy, Maratha, Iyer, Rajput and from apps namely 40Plus Matrimony, Brahmin Matrimony, Christian Matrimony, Divorcee Matrimony, Jain Matrimony, Muslim Matrimony, Sikh Matrimony, Vishwakarma Matrimony and more!

It is also a place where to-be couples from communities like Agrawal, Yadav, Rajput, Jain, Reddy, Aryavysya, Nadar, Adidravidar, Kamma, Lingayath, Manglik, Jat, Chettiyar, Padmasali, Kapu, Buddhist, Konguvellalar, Bhumihar find their perfect match.

Looking to search for a bride/groom based on Religion? We have matches from all religions including Hindu, Muslim, Christian, Buddhist, Jain, Christian Catholic, Christian Orthodox, Christian Protestant, Muslim Shia, and Muslim Sunni.

Our top registrations come from States namely Tamil Nadu, Andhra Pradesh, Kerala, Maharashtra, Karnataka, West Bengal, Delhi, Orissa, Uttar Pradesh, and Gujarat and from cities namely Chennai, Hyderabad, Bangalore, Mumbai, Delhi, Kolkata, Pune, Ernakulam, Trivandrum, and Coimbatore.

You can narrow your search based on mother tongue/first language of the matches. Our top languages that people register for are Hindi, Tamil, Malayalam, Telugu, Marathi, Bengali, Punjabi, Gujarati, Kannada, and Oriya.

BharatMatrimony has been conferred with numerous national and international awards for its pioneering spirit, vision, and continuous growth through its path-breaking and innovative excellence. Some of our accolades include:

• "One of the 100 Most Innovative Companies Globally" as recognized by Red Herring
• "Most Trusted Online Matrimony" award by The Brand Trust Report
• NDTV-Hindu Lifestyle Award for the "Best Community Matrimony Website"
• Ranked twice in "Top 50 Fastest Growing Tech Companies in India" by Deloitte
• "The Most Visited Matrimony Portal in the World" by Comscore

Your privacy is a top priority for us at all times, so feel safe. We are a 100% secure app for shaadi.

Download today for FREE and gain the mobile advantage in your partner search!

descriptionHtml:
Welcome to BharatMatrimony, India’s No. 1 and Most Trusted Matrimony Services company. BharatMatrimony pioneered online matrimony in India 21 years ago and it has helped millions of Indians find their Perfect Match. We organise more marriages than anyone else in the world and we are featured in the Limca Book of World Records for the highest number of documented marriages online. BharatMatrimony is part of the Matrimony.com Group, the only pure play matrimony company to be publicly listed on Indian stock exchanges.

Register Free and get these benefits:
• Profile Creation - Create your profile and browse through millions of matches basis your preference.
• Compatible Match Recommendation - With our powerful AI-driven matching algorithm MIMA™, get compatible match recommendations that connect with you on values, lifestyles, and more.
• Notifications - Get instant notifications on your mobile when there are new matches for you, someone is interested in your profile or a prospect responds to you.
• Choice & Preference - With our advanced filters, find your match by language, City, education, occupation, and more.

Additional benefits with a Premium Membership:
• Video Call - Connect securely with your matches instantly through our new video call facility to get to know them better.
• Chat & Voice Call - Now connect with matches anytime and anywhere with our secure chat and call features.
• Instant Messaging - Send interests or personalised messages directly to matches you like.
• Access BharatMatrimony “Prime” - a membership service that gives genuine profiles that are government ID-verified.
• Featured Listing - Get prominently featured in Premium Members’ section and receive better responses.
• Complete profile information - View full profile information like educational institute, company, and horoscope/ kundli.

When it comes to your safety & privacy, we are As Caring As Family
• With the “Who can see me” feature, you have complete control of who can see your profile and contact you. You can set various criteria like age, income, education, community, etc., and allow only prospects who meet these criteria to view and contact you.
• With the SecureConnect™ feature, you can receive calls from prospects without revealing your mobile number.

Search by Religion, Community, Language, or Location
We have helped millions of couples unite together through our 17 regional matrimony services like HindiMatrimony, MarathiMatrimony, PunjabiMatrimony, GujaratiMatrimony, BengaliMatrimony, TamilMatrimony, TeluguMatrimony, KeralaMatrimony, KannadaMatrimony, OriyaMatrimony, UrduMatrimony, MarwadiMatrimony, AssameseMatrimony, ParsiMatrimony, RajasthaniMatrimony, BihariMatrimony, and SindhiMatrimony.

Looking for a Hindu, Muslim, Christian, Buddhist, Jain bride or groom? We have millions of matches from all religions. You can find matching profiles from all major Indian communities such as Rajput, Agarwal, Brahmin - Pandit, Yadav, Kayastha, SC, Jat, Baniya, Brahmin - Kanyakubj, Kurmi Kshatriya, Brahmin - Saryuparin, Brahmin - Gaur, Khatri, Nair, Ezhava, 96 Kuli Maratha, Kayastha, Lingayath, Khandayat, Thiyya, Vishwakarma.

Find professional profiles such as Software Professionals, MBAs, Engineers, Doctors, IAS/ IPS/ ICS officers, Chartered Accountants, Bankers, Professors, Lecturers, Businessmen, Pilots, Defence officers, Lawyers, and more.

Are you an NRI looking to marry an Indian?
Globally, lakhs of NRI brides and grooms have found their perfect partner here. You can find NRI profiles from UK, USA, Canada, Australia, Singapore, UAE, Malaysia, Saudi Arabia, Qatar, and Oman.

Awards and Recognitions:
• The Most Trusted Matrimony Brand (Brand Trust Report 2014 & 2015)
• The No.1 Matrimony Site for NRIs & Indians (Juxt Consult)
• "The Most Visited Matrimony Portal in the World" by Comscore
• Recognised as a Superbrand in 2019-20

Millions of happy marriages happened through BharatMatrimony. Yours could be next!
Download App now!

#BeChoosy on India’s biggest matrimony platform

Register Free and get these benefits:
• Profile Creation - Create your profile and browse through millions of matches basis your preference.

• Choice & Preference - With our advanced filters, find your match by language, city, education, occupation, and more.
Additional benefits with a Premium Membership:
• Video/ Voice Calls & Chat - Now connect with matches anytime and anywhere with our secure instant chat and video/voice calling.
• Instant Messaging - Send interests or personalized messages directly to matches you like.

• Featured Listing - Get featured in Premium Members’ section and receive better responses.
